ygData.subject: Re: Mesmerize
ygData.msgSnippet: They resist what? Mesmerize or Memory Blur? I had no problem with Memory Blur on aviaks. Skara de Toxxulia  ... From: Silverlock
ygData.messageBody:
They resist what? Mesmerize or Memory Blur? I had no problem with Memory
Blur on aviaks.
Skara de Toxxulia < Elite >

-----Original Message-----
From: Silverlock [mailto:croesus@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 2:45 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Mesmerize


From: Silverlock <croesus@...>

At 01:45 PM 6/1/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>

Sorry but this isn't true. Aviak rroks which cone BLUE to a level 20
Enchanter can resist it. In fact they mostly resist mine.

>Memory Blur is unresistable on MOBs under level 30 and it doesn't include
>the "stun" effect. If you Mem Blur it, you better get the hell out of
Dodge
>in a hurry.
>
>Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
>Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
>
>> From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>>
>> >From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>
>> >Absolutely incorrect. It ERASES the hate list and I
>> >can prove it, on any mob. Don't know where you got
>> >that mixing thing from.
>>
>> The mixing the hate list is from the stratics spell list.
>>
>> Maybe mesmerize is actually broken (in a good way for us) and
>> does too much?
>>
>> Now I'm confused about what memory blur is supposed to do. So is
>> it just a
>> higher
>> level mesmerize without the stun?
>>
>> The stratics spell list says the NPC forgets about player. So
>> does this mean
>> mesmerize is actually better than blur - except its a lower level spell?
>>
>> Azboklin the enchanter
>>
>>
>>
>>
